example.eg: The prisoners have escaped.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逃跑，逃开，逃走，逃出, 逃逸，脱离

example.eg: The prisoner escaped from his jailers.
example.egtrans: 囚犯从狱卒眼皮子底下逃走了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从…处逃离, 从…处逃跑

example.eg: He goes out to work on the car to escape from his mother-in-law.
example.egtrans: 他到外面去修车以此回避见他的丈母娘。

example.eg: The refugees crossed the border to escape the war.
example.egtrans: 难民穿越边界以逃避战争。

example.eg: The boy escaped punishment by blaming his friend.
example.egtrans: 那男孩把责任推到朋友身上，逃避了惩罚。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 躲开, 逃避, 躲避

example.eg: The prisoners' escape shocked everyone.
example.egtrans: 囚犯逃跑震惊了每个人。

example.eg: Reading was an escape from his parents' arguing.
example.egtrans: 阅读是他对父母争吵的逃避。

example.eg: There was an escape beneath the window in case of fire.
example.egtrans: 一旦发生火灾，窗户下有逃生通道。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逃跑方法, 逃脱方法

example.eg: There was an escape of gas in the basement.
The criminal escaped just before the police arrived.
example.egtrans: 犯罪分子在警察即将到达前逃脱。

example.eg: The fumes escaped into the atmosphere.
The memory of her face has escaped with the passage of time.
example.egtrans: 随着时间流逝，记忆中她的面容也逐渐淡去。

example.eg: I know the face, but his name escapes me.
example.egtrans: 我认识他的面孔，但记不得他的名字了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 被…忘记, 让…想不起来

example.eg: A swear word escaped her lips.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不慎发出, 不慎说出, 逸出, 脱（口）而出

example.eg: Harry Houdini was a famous escape artist.
example.egtrans: 哈利·胡迪尼是知名的逃脱术大师。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逃脱术大师, 脱身术表演者

dsense.name: escape artist
dsense.guideword: informal (prisoner who frequently escapes) (非正式用语)

example.eg: There's an escape clause which allows us to terminate the contract if necessary.

dsense.name: escape hatch
dsense.guideword: (door to an emergency exit) (飞机，船舱的)

example.eg: Submarines usually have only one escape hatch; it is also the way in.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逃生门，救生口，紧急出口

example.eg: Getting high with his friends was an escape mechanism.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逃逸速度, 第二宇宙速度

example.eg: In the event of fire, please use the fire escape to descend to the ground floor.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 火灾安全出口, 太平梯, 太平梯

example.eg: Mary had a narrow escape when a car nearly hit her.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 险险逃脱, 幸免于难

example.eg: The flight attendant indicated the lighted ways of escape on the airplane.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逃离路线, 逃生路线

example.eg: I didn't want to attend the conference, but there was no way of escape.
